markdownRemark.html: The Alhambra is one of the must see places in the world and is an Andalusian palastine city located in Granada. It consists of a set of palaces , gardens and a fortress (Alcazaba). The Alcazaba is a fascinating area with great views of the city on one side and of the snow-covered Sierra Nevada mountains on the other. The eagle-eyed can pick out the famous viewpoint Mirador de San Nicolas in the cityscape.

frontmatter.title: Alhambra & Generalife

The eagle-eyed can pick out the famous viewpoint Mirador de San Nicolas in the cityscape.
